root.message: The QUALITY_MGMNT field for indicator 6-4-2, translated into en
root.data:
• First, the annual AQUASTAT questionnaire on water and agriculture, used for collecting information on SDG indicator 6.4.2, was endorsed by FAO’s Office of the Chief Statistician (OCS).
  • During the reporting process, the OCS provides overall guidance, including on metadata reporting, based on the Metadata Dissemination Standard approved by the FAO IDWG-Statistics Technical Task Force.
  • Data on Environmental flow requirements is re updated only when detailed methodology and metadata reprovided and when consistency in the values is ensured.
  • After revision and validation, data are submitted to the OCS who also ensures the quality of the data and results.
